Package io.inversion.action.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthAction.JwtUserDao.RevokedTokenCache  
    AuthAction.SessionDao  
    AuthAction.UserDao  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AclAction
    The AclAction secures an API by making sure that a requests matches one or more declared AclRules AclRules specify the roles and permissions that a user must have to access specific method/path combinations and can also specify input/output parameters that are either required or restricted
    AclRule  
    AuthAction  
    AuthAction.InMemoryRevokedTokenCache  
    AuthAction.InMemorySessionDao  
    AuthAction.JwtUserDao  
    RemoveJsonPropertyAction  
    RemoveQueryParamAction  
    RequireJsonPropertyAction<T extends RequireJsonPropertyAction>  
    RequireQueryParamAction
    Requires query string parameter "requiredParam=anyValue" OR "eq(requiredParam,anyValue)" be present on the request url querystring with a non empty or 'null' value.
    SetJsonPropertyAction  
    SetQueryParamAction
